title: golint: does not pickup missing comment on `String() string`
body:
go 1.6

The following program:
https://play.golang.org/p/LNGVcnYIT1

Passes golint even though it is clearly missing a comment on the `String() string` function.

it should emit
`a.go:1:1: exported method T.String should have comment or be unexported`
